entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 09:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
